ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] (Off-Topic) Some advice?
ygData.msgSnippet: Harmonic is working on a database.  Caster Realm s setup is also a database of sorts. Rokenn ... From: Reece, Tom CPT- 25IDL G4
ygData.messageBody:
Harmonic is working on a database. Caster Realm's setup is also a database
of sorts.

Rokenn

-----Original Message-----
From: Reece, Tom CPT- 25IDL G4
[mailto:g4mntofcr@...]
Sent: Tuesday, March 28, 2000 1:15 PM
To: eqbards@onelist.com
Subject: RE: [eqbards] (Off-Topic) Some advice?


From: "Reece, Tom CPT- 25IDL G4" <g4mntofcr@...>

But wasn't someone else on the list already working on creating a database
for the Song Analysis? If they create the database and got it working, then
all you would need is to provide all the EQ sites with a link to your
website.

Galtin

-----Original Message-----
From: Talies the Wanderer [mailto:snicker@...]
Sent: Tuesday, March 28, 2000 11:12 AM
To: eqbards@onelist.com
Subject: Re: [eqbards] (Off-Topic) Some advice?


From: Talies the Wanderer <snicker@...>

At 10:01 AM 3/28/00 -1000, you wrote:
>From: "Reece, Tom CPT- 25IDL G4" <g4mntofcr@...>
>
>Well if you decide against Everlore there is always Allakhazams site as
well
>as the EQLizer site. IMO those two are much better sites than Everlore.


It wasn't that I was looking for hosting - it's that they offered, and the
offer of a custom-built database was pretty nice. I'm still witing to see
the contract before I decide. Thanks for all the input, though - you guys
are very valuable =)

Talies
